Dear Bill:
Thank you for your letter of July 30 in which you discuss the
AETC application for more space in the spectrum for microwave
use.
In the light of your up-coming vacation in the latter part of
August and the possibility of a NAEB representation to the
office of John Bystrom in the HEW, may I suggest that an
early date be set for the same. This is based on the possibi¬
lity that we will have such a meeting.
In discussing the matter with Dick Hull over the telephone,
he was in agreement with me that, if the TV Board could not
function in this capacity, maybe the Executive Committee
could do so.
If we are to have this meeting, I would suggest that it be at
the earliest possible date, sometime before August 15.
With kindest'personal regards, I am
RDH/ml
Sincerely yours,
